headers.subject: [tosdr:2384] Wikipedia users responsible for their own contributions

html:
(note?) Users are legally responsible for their own contributions and actions.

Section 1.b
You are responsible for your own actions: You are legally responsible for your edits and contributions on Wikimedia Projects, so for your own protection you should exercise caution and avoid contributing any content that may result in criminal or civil liability under any applicable laws. For clarity, applicable law includes at least the laws of the United States of America. Although we may not agree with such actions, we warn editors and contributors that authorities may seek to apply other country laws to you, including local laws where you live or where you view or edit content. WMF generally cannot offer any protection, guarantee, immunity or indemnification.

http://wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use

***

To be honest, I'm not sure this is even worth mentioning. 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Wikipedia users responsible for their own contributions
text:
(note?) Users are legally responsible for their own contributions and 
actions.

Section 1.b
*You are responsible for your own actions: You are legally responsible for 
your edits and contributions on Wikimedia Projects, so for your own 
protection you should exercise caution and avoid contributing any content 
that may result in criminal or civil liability under any applicable laws. 
For clarity, applicable law includes at least the laws of the United States 
of America. Although we may not agree with such actions, we warn editors 
and contributors that authorities may seek to apply other country laws to 
you, including local laws where you live or where you view or edit content. 
WMF generally cannot offer any protection, guarantee, immunity or 
indemnification.*
*
*
*http://wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use
*

***

To be honest, I'm not sure this is even worth mentioning. 

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
